title: Chosen as the Frenchman's Bride
description: Tall, bronzed Frenchman Xavier Salgado-Lézille isn''t a man a girl can say no to easily. Jane tries to play it cool, but she''s inexperienced… and a virgin. Falling in love isn''t part of the plan…neither is discovering she''s pregnant once theaffair is over.Xavier knows she''s carrying his child, and he wants an heir. Jane has been chosen ashis bride!
author: Abby Green
